item.title: Guess Who's Coming to Dallas?
item.description: Well, well. And I thought they’d retired. I suppose there are still a few living acts I’d pay to see after all. 🐦🐝 No idea whether we’ll make it out to this one, but might bee nice. Read all about my love for their Hall and Oates cover album. And give those songs a deep listen.
